title: Oh hey, it's me again. With more FREE SKINS/CHAMPIONS!
body:
I'm going to be having another contest soon for people to win some more FREE SKINS/CHAMPIONS! Boop. ~

**upvote this post, so I know that you guys are interested. :3**

remember, next contests hint is "_Are You Afraid of the Dark?_" 
if you guys guess what the contest is, I'll randomize the people who guess correctly and gift a FREE skin or champion to somebody. 

rawr. hope you're all having a lovely day.

shout-out to my winners from last time who won **Jade Dragon Wukong**, **Kha'Zix** & **Headhunter Master Yi** !

.
.
.
.
.


**UPDATE !**

The contest will take place tomorrow morning. I will reveal the contest in a new post, along with the rules and regulations. Just a note, if you end up winning, _remember it does take a day or two after adding you to get the gift_ because . . . well rito. Also, **upvoting really helps** and gives me incentive to keep doing this. I love helping you guys out and I love giving free gifts. :3 plus, like usual, if the post reaches **150 upvotes**, I'll give another skin. If it somehow reaches **300 upvotes**, I'll give **ANOTHER** skin. So that's **TWO** skins off the top along with however many winners I choose from the contest. :)

Some of the ideas you guys have posted are absolutely hilarious, haha. Anywho, keep posting and get prepared for a fun one (at least imo). Love you guys!!

.
.
.
.
**UPDATE !**

Contest is open! Check out the post!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/pF15cG0A-ilumas-are-you-afraid-of-the-dark-contest-win-a-free-skinchampion

replies.body:
{{champion:131}}  "I hereby call to order this meeting of the Midnight Society.
{{champion:238}}  "I, uh... feel like we're missing somebody."
{{champion:61}}  "Perhaps it is Teemo that we are missing?"
{{champion:238}}  "Oh.  Yeah, where is he?"
{{champion:17}}  "RIGHT HERE.  JUST BECAUSE I STOP TALKING OR MOVING FOR LIKE TWO SECONDS DOESN'T MEAN I'M GONE."
{{champion:238}}  "..."
{{champion:131}}  "..."
{{champion:17}}  "... You seriously thought I left?"
{{champion:238}}  "You're really easy to miss..."
{{champion:17}}  "Why are we even doing this meeting?"
{{champion:238}}  "Wait, there's only four of us here.  Aren't there supposed to be more?"
{{champion:131}}  "Well Leona said she'd-"
{{champion:89}}  "'SUP, BITCHEEEEEEEEES!?"
{{champion:131}}  "Oh for the-"
{{champion:28}}  "AAAAAAGH.  NO, NO, GET THE LIGHT AWAY.  MY EYES."
{{champion:238}}  "Oh there's Eve.  I knew we weren't just missing Teemo."
{{champion:61}}  "Teemo seems to be gone again.  Should I go find him?"
{{champion:17}}  "I'M STILL RIGHT HERE."
{{champion:61}}  "... I cannot see you when you stand still like that."
{{champion:17}}  "RRRRRRRRRGH."
{{champion:28}}  "Okay... so..."
{{champion:238}}  "Why are you wearing two eye-patches?"
{{champion:28}}  "It's all I could find.  There's a reason I stick to the night you know."
{{champion:89}}  "You should get out in the sun more.  Wink wink."
{{champion:131}}  "... What."
{{champion:89}}  "Hmm?"
{{champion:17}}  "So wait.  Was Akali coming?"
{{champion:238}}  "Oh shit where did you come from?"
{{champion:17}}  "... Like, are you just this dense or are you screwing with me?"
{{champion:131}}  "Whatever. I don't care. We're going on without her or whoever else."
{{champion:89}}  "So what's this nerdfest about then?"
{{champion:131}}  "I told you!  We gather here and tell scary tales and stuff!
{{champion:238}}  "Wait, that's what we're doing?"
{{champion:84}}  "Hey, sorry I'm late!  So what's going on?"
{{champion:238}}  "We're telling scary stories.  Apparently."
{{champion:84}}  "... Wait, what?  You know I kill people, right?"
{{champion:238}}  "Yeah, so do I."
{{champion:61}}  "Oh, killing is fun.  I love that game."
{{champion:89}}  "Wait, Diana, are you actually scared of stuff?"
{{champion:131}}  "........................................................."
{{champion:28}}  "....... I had venereal disease for a little while."
{{champion:238}}  "Twisted Fate's not here."
{{champion:28}}  "Oh, yeah.  Right."
{{champion:67}}  "HEY, GUYS."
{{champion:131}}  "Oh god damn it."
{{champion:238}}  "How the hell did you even find us, Vayne?"
{{champion:67}}  "You kidding? It's like my job to hunt night nerds like you guys. Wait - why's Leona here?"
{{champion:89}}  "Diana invited me."
{{champion:67}}  "Oh, has she made her move yet?"
{{champion:89}}  "What?"
{{champion:131}}  "VAYNE. THE SHIT. WHY DO YOU HAVE TO RUIN EVERYTHING!?"
{{champion:238}}  "Yeah, honestly, though... this is like the sole reason we don't invite you anywhere."
{{champion:61}}  "My input displays her as a "buzzkill".
{{champion:67}}  "Aw, come on, guys."
{{champion:56}}  "Vayne, just get out."
{{champion:131}}  "Woah woah woah WOAH.  The hell was that?"
{{champion:56}}  "Oh. Uh. Er."
{{champion:67}}  "Noc? Where the hell are you? I know I smelled you, but..."
{{champion:238}}  "Wow. Smooth. Attack his body odor issue."
{{champion:67}}  "What? No, that's not what- oh screw you."
{{champion:84}}  "Well, she has a point.  I don't see Noc anywhere."
{{champion:56}}  "What? Yes you do."
{{champion:238}}  "No we don't."
{{champion:56}}  "I'm all around you."
{{champion:67}}  "... Like literally?"
{{champion:56}}  "... Yeeees?  Could you really not tell?"
{{champion:238}}  "... I thought it was just night time..."
{{champion:56}}  "It's actually about 12 noon... Diana set her clock wrong."
{{champion:89}}  "Ha! Fail."
{{champion:131}}  "I fucking hate you guys."
{{champion:89}}  "Aw, come on, Di-Di!  We're just messing with you!  Don't go- ah god damn it."
{{champion:56}}  "Well... somebody's gonna have to go talk to her now."
{{champion:28}}  "I dunno... she's so... emo."
{{champion:238}}  "Yeah, I'm with Eve on this one."
{{champion:84}}  "Ditto."
{{champion:56}}  ".................................. Well.................."

{{champion:56}}  "Wait, where'd Teemo go?"
{{champion:17}}  "FUCK YOU GUYS."

If I'm battling Laughing Fish I'm screwed
Tell us tour worst experience when getting ganked by Nocturne

I laughed way harder at this that I should have. I don't know why, but re-living my fear when I first went into a game against a Nocturne and I had no idea his abilities or anything just . . .  oh man . . . it brought back some chills.

> [{quoted}](name=iLuma,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KxA8Ui6m,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-20T20:06:18.389+0000)
>
> I laughed way harder at this that I should have. I don't know why, but re-living my fear when I first went into a game against a Nocturne and I had no idea his abilities or anything just . . .  oh man . . . it brought back some chills.

I'm often on the other side of that, being the nocturne.

That is one of my favorite abilities in the entire game, it has multiple uses and fits his theme and the name of the ability insanely well.

As for the contest, not sure if this is right of course but I feel like you're referencing the popular Nikalodeon television show "Are You Afraid of the Dark" so I'm going to guess that the contest will be "what are your best league of legends horror stories?" I'm uncertain whether or not it will be lore based (such as come up with a scary story in a champions past) or if it will be in game based (like holy damn, Nocturne just use paranoia with TF using destiny behind me while Shen uses United We Stand while the botlanes Tahm uses Abyssal Voyage with a Varus or something.)
